actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize the National Institute of Justice to provide technical assistance to State and local law enforcement entities, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Institute of Justice Technology Assistance Act of 1995
subjects: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

summary.text: National Institute of Justice Technology Assistance Act of 1995 - Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to require the Director of the Bureau of Justice Assistance to provide assistance to State and local government law enforcement entities to identify, select, develop, modernize, and purchase new technologies to provide a safer environment for police officers and to more efficiently and effectively fight crime. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: National Institute of Justice Technology Assistance Act of 1995
A bill to authorize the National Institute of Justice to provide technical assistance to State and local law enforcement entities, and for other purposes.
